segments.text: Tristan , could you stay a few extra minutes to discuss your project with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We're on a pretty tight schedule , but we should be able to finish it just on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are all of your team members on schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A few of the graphic designers are a bit behind in their work because of computer problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How have they decided to deal with that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They've agreed to work over-time until it's finished . They've even decided to come in on the weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true dedication . I'm impressed . When is it due ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We agreed that the deadline was next Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Well , given that your colleagues are working so hard on this project , I suppose we could change that deadline to Monday morning , I won't have time to look over it on the weekend anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'd be very helpful . An extra weekend is all they really need . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's alright . Make sure everyone knows that we must stick to the new deadline .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know you have a tight schedule , so I won't take up more of your time . Have a good evening .
segments.speaker: S1
